hero.title: Automated Prospecting via Google Maps
description: Tired of wasting hours on manual prospecting? I developed this automation with n8n to capture qualified leads from Google Maps in a scalable and efficient way.
The solution searches for business data in defined locations, filters the most relevant results, and automatically organizes everything into a Google Drive spreadsheet.
Ideal for sales teams looking to accelerate lead generation without increasing manual work.

features.title: Key Features
list: Automated search for businesses via Google Maps
Intelligent lead filtering based on defined criteria
Automatic generation and organization into Google Drive spreadsheets

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.intro: Manual lead prospecting was a bottleneck: it consumed a lot of the team's time and hindered the scalability of sales actions.
points: Efficiently interacting with the Google Maps API.
Implementing automatic filters to ensure lead quality.
Ensuring organized integration with Google Sheets.
mission: Build a 'plug-and-play' solution easy to use internally or by clients.
Drastically reduce the time spent generating prospecting lists.
Create a scalable and low-cost automation.

beforeAfter.before: Hours spent on manual searches on Google Maps.
beforeAfter.after: Automation running on demand, generating lists in minutes.

beforeAfter.before: Manually filled spreadsheets, prone to errors and outdated data.
beforeAfter.after: Structured spreadsheets, automatically updated with filtered leads ready for the sales team.
